channel.title: DIY on today is tomorrow's past
channel.description: Recent content in DIY on today is tomorrow's past

item.title: Day329
item.author: ingo@ingo-richter.io (Ingo Richter)
item.description: WFH Day 329 A new year, and still, we are mostly trapped and confined in our homes without much todo. The days seem to follow the same pattern day in, day out. I went back to exercise more, not to feel brain tired, and have something accomplished with my body. Anyway, that’s not what I wanted to write. It was only something that came to my mind before I come to what I started two days ago: making a Sourdough starter.
